pkgmetadata.longdescription: Single Valued Neutrosophic Kruskal-Wallis and Mann Whitney Tests // Dealing with neutrosophic data in single valued form using score, accuracy and certainty functions to calculate ranks of Single Valued Neutrosophic Set (SVNS), also to calculate the Mann-Whitney test, and making a post-hoc test after rejecting the null hypothesis using the Neutrosophic Statistics Kruskal- Wallis test. For more information see Miari, Mahmoud; Anan, Mohamad Taher; Zeina, Mohamed Bisher(2022) https://digitalrepository.unm.edu/nss_journal/vol51/iss1/60/.
